name: Chaos Control
summary:
It is the year 2071. Only one space fighter has the courage, composure and razor-sharp reflexes to eliminate the savage Kesh Rhan extraterrestrials ... ace pilot Jessica Darkhill. As Lieutenant Darkhill, your missions emcompass heart-stopping battles in four distinctly different, full-screen synthesized universes. Your destiny: to save Eath. 
 
Gameplay consists of on-rail shooting sequences in pre-rendered polygonal FMV worlds. 
 
ENGAGE! Or not. The Game Over sequence is rad.
